titleStmt.title: The araygnement of Paris a pastorall. Presented before the Queenes Maiestie, by the Children of her chappell.
titleStmt.author: Peele, George, 1556-1596.
Paulilli, Anello. Giudito di Paride.

notesStmt.note: Possibly based on: Paulilli, Anello. Il giudito di Paride.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
